CustomField.description:
In Months, the duration of the agreement based on the most recent “Roll-Up Qualified” Opportunity. Self Service Record Types will automatically increment to “1.” Enterprise deals can be 1 or 12. Updated automatically upon each new RUQ Opportunity; maps back automatically to each new Opportunity created within this Account.
https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/New-Salesforce-Fields-Opportunities-Business-Units-Accounts--Ay1q1~SCRlqq2EmE9wVHvqBrAQ-PkyPecvObh7GLmPeED6TB
https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/How-to-Use-the-Opportunity-Fields-April-2020--Ay52tLsUoyROBPXqkP99eIafAQ-Wy8AxHfGwiplwNW20Jhl3
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In months, what is the term of this Customer's agreement.
CustomField.label: Contract Term
